data.name: Sample - Trend Micro Vision One - 1.0.0
data.description: Sample playbooks for "Trend Micro Vision One" connector. If you are planning to use any of the sample playbooks in your environment, ensure that you clone those playbooks and move them to a different collection, since the sample playbook collection gets deleted during connector upgrade and delete.

workflows.name: Add to Block List
workflows.description: Adds an email address, file SHA-1, domain, IP address, or URL to the Suspicious Object List, which blocks the objects on subsequent detections. Note: Every object in the request body must refer to only one item.

arguments.title: Trend Micro Vision One: Add to Block List

workflows.name: Search Alerts
workflows.description: Displays information about workbench alerts that match the specified criteria in a paginated list. Note: This method shows up to 10 entries per page. If the response body exceeds 50 MB in size, only one entry per page is shown.

arguments.title: Trend Micro Vision One: Search Alerts

workflows.name: Get Detection Data
workflows.description: Displays search results from the Detection Data source.

arguments.title: Trend Micro Vision One: Get Detection Data

workflows.name: Add to Exception List
workflows.description: Adds domains, file SHA-1, file SHA-256, IP addresses, sender addresses, or URLs to the Exception List.

arguments.title: Trend Micro Vision One: Add to Exception List

workflows.name: Remove from Suspicious Object List
workflows.description: Deletes information about domains, file SHA-1, file SHA-256, IP addresses, sender addresses, or URLs from the Suspicious Object List.

arguments.title: Trend Micro Vision One: Remove from Suspicious Object List

routes.name: Start -> Remove from Suspicious Object List

workflows.name: Add to Suspicious Object List
workflows.description: Adds information about domains, file SHA-1, file SHA-256, IP addresses, email addresses, or URLs to the Suspicious Object List.

arguments.title: Trend Micro Vision One: Add to Suspicious Object List

routes.name: Start -> Add to Suspicious Object List

arguments.title: Trend Micro Vision One: Get Endpoint Details

workflows.name: Restore endpoint
workflows.description: Restores network connectivity to one or more endpoints that applied the "Isolate endpoint" action Note: You can specify either the computer name ("endpointName") or the GUID of the installed agent program ("agentGuid").

arguments.title: Trend Micro Vision One: Restore endpoint

workflows.name: Get Alert Details
workflows.description: Displays information about the specified alert

arguments.title: Trend Micro Vision One: Get Alert Details

workflows.name: Quarantine Email Message
workflows.description: Moves a message from one or more mailboxes to their corresponding quarantine folders.

arguments.title: Trend Micro Vision One: Quarantine Email Message

workflows.name: Terminates Process
workflows.description: Terminates a process that is running on one or more endpoints Note: You can specify either the computer name ("endpointName") or the GUID of the installed agent program ("agentGuid").

arguments.title: Trend Micro Vision One: Terminates Process

workflows.name: Isolate Endpoints
workflows.description: Disconnects one or more endpoints from the network (but allows communication with the managing Trend Micro server product) Note: You can specify either the computer name ("endpointName") or the GUID of the installed agent program ("agentGuid").

arguments.title: Trend Micro Vision One: Isolate Endpoints

workflows.name: Remove from Exception List
workflows.description: Deletes the specified objects from the Exception List.

arguments.title: Trend Micro Vision One: Remove from Exception List

workflows.name: Delete Email Message
workflows.description: Deletes a message from one or more mailboxes.

arguments.title: Trend Micro Vision One: Delete Email Message

workflows.name: Collect File
workflows.description: Collects a file from one or more endpoints and then sends the files to Trend Micro Vision One in a password-protected archive Note: You can specify either the computer name ("endpointName") or the GUID of the installed agent program ("agentGuid").

arguments.title: Trend Micro Vision One: Collect File

workflows.name: Remove from Block List
workflows.description: Removes an email address, file SHA-1, domain, IP address, or URL that was added to the Suspicious Object List using the "Add to block list" action. Note: Every object in the request body must refer to only one item.

arguments.title: Trend Micro Vision One: Remove from Block List

workflows.name: Get Task Details
workflows.description: Retrieves an object containing the results of a response task.

arguments.title: Trend Micro Vision One: Get Task Details
